name: Bad North
description: Bad North is a charming but brutal real-time tactics roguelite. Defend your idyllic island kingdom against a horde of Viking invaders, as you lead the desperate exodus of your people. Command your loyal subjects to take full tactical advantage of the unique shape of each island.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: AMD Athlon X4 5350, Intel Core i3-2100T or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 480M, Radeon HD 6790 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Yes
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: AMD Athlon X4 605e, Intel Celeron G1610 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 7850, GeForce GTX 470 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Yes
